ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Pixie Strike
ygData.msgSnippet: Curiously giants in Warsliks are not giants unless it has been fixed.  They were mezzable last tiem I was there despite being nearly identical to the ones
ygData.messageBody:
Curiously giants in Warsliks are not giants unless it has been fixed. They
were mezzable last tiem I was there despite being nearly identical to the
ones found elsewhere in Kunark.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 11:54 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Pixie Strike


At 01:28 PM 2/7/01 -0500, you wrote:
>Do giants automatically save vs Pixie Strike?
>
>Was in a FM giant group last night that pulled 2, and the one resisted
every
>strike I threw at it...a good 5 or 6 or so.

you should have gotten the message "that [something] cannot be mezmerized
with that spell'' or
something similar to that. nothing flagged with the ''giant flag'' can be
mezzed.


>Of course, it liked me best after that. :P
>
>Atonal



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
